channel.title: EuphoriaPvP - The Start of True PKing
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://euphoriapvp.com/logo.png[/img]
[B][U]Welcome to our Project Thread! [/U][/B] [B][U]Well First things first, Here is an introduction to why I want to start this Project:[/U][/B]
Around 2 months ago I started a small pk server, Used Factor-Zero as my base and coded from there. I got pretty far for being I was only advertising on a small community. Now that I am back, I want to develop something greater than just a small server. I want to take my server to the top 10, I know these are big goals, but you have to set them in order to achieve them. I believe I can do it with some help.
[B][U]Secondly, Some information about me.[/U][/B]
My Name is Jake, I have been in the rsps community since I was 12, So for 5 years since I am 17 now. I have learned all the basics of coding but I will admit to using tuts for most of my stuff. I have not learned the Java Language efficiently but I plan on it. I plan on doing alot to the server and to my player base.
[I]Server Base: PI - Factor-Zero due to I like their client base. By the time Im done with it, It will look nothing like it.[/I]
[B][U]Server Development TO-DO List:[/U][/B] - Add ALL Standard Minigames - Add Curses - Add PvP Drops - Add EP System - Make an efficient Highscore via MYSQL - More Shops - Ancient Artifacts - Dicing ( I have only seen this command wise, Im talking about the models and everything) - Much Much More!
[B][U]What I have done so far:[/U][/B] - Added in the standard Donor Points and Donator Zone - Fixed a couple of client bugs - Fixed the buy bug - Created the webclient (So easy that it Shouldnt be here) - Added in a couple custom items - Integrated my characters to my vBulletin
[B][U]What I have done with the website:[/U][/B] - Added vBulletin - Made custom webclient page - Integrated Server - Still looking for more ideas.
[B][U]Conclusion:[/U][/B] Well, Seriously I need help, I cant do this by myself, It really is a pain when It is only me doing shit for the server. If you can help me in any way, I would deeply appreciate it.
[B][U]Contact Info:[/U][/B] MSN: jakeierome@live.com
Links: Website:http://euphoriapvp.com/[/CENTER]

item.title: EuphoriaPvP - The Start of True PKing
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Good luck! You might wanna add the main focus of the game (generally “We mainly focus on the players!”). I love your thought that you have to set big goals in order to achieve them.

Read full topic

item.title: EuphoriaPvP - The Start of True PKing
item.dc:creator: @samoankilla samoankilla
item.description:
@samoankilla wrote:

[CENTER]

Welcome to our Project Thread!

Well First things first, Here is an introduction to why I want to start this Project:

Around 2 months ago I started a small pk server, Used Factor-Zero as my base and coded from there. I got pretty far for being I was only advertising on a small community. Now that I am back, I want to develop something greater than just a small server. I want to take my server to the top 10, I know these are big goals, but you have to set them in order to achieve them. I believe I can do it with some help.

Secondly, Some information about me.

My Name is Jake, I have been in the rsps community since I was 12, So for 5 years since I am 17 now. I have learned all the basics of coding but I will admit to using tuts for most of my stuff. I have not learned the Java Language efficiently but I plan on it. I plan on doing alot to the server and to my player base.

Server Base: PI - Factor-Zero due to I like their client base. By the time Im done with it, It will look nothing like it.

Server Development TO-DO List:

  • Add ALL Standard Minigames
  • Add Curses
  • Add PvP Drops
  • Add EP System
  • Make an efficient Highscore via MYSQL
  • More Shops
  • Ancient Artifacts
  • Dicing ( I have only seen this command wise, Im talking about the models and everything)
  • Much Much More!

What I have done so far:

  • Added in the standard Donor Points and Donator Zone
  • Fixed a couple of client bugs
  • Fixed the buy bug
  • Created the webclient (So easy that it Shouldnt be here)
  • Added in a couple custom items
  • Integrated my characters to my vBulletin

What I have done with the website:

  • Added vBulletin
  • Made custom webclient page
  • Integrated Server
  • Still looking for more ideas.

Conclusion:
Well, Seriously I need help, I cant do this by myself, It really is a pain when It is only me doing shit for the server. If you can help me in any way, I would deeply appreciate it.

Contact Info:
MSN: jakeierome@live.com

Links:
Website:http://euphoriapvp.com/[/CENTER]

Read full topic
item.source: EuphoriaPvP - The Start of True PKing
